content:
In my Amsterdam talk I mentioned the (Quantified Self)(http://quantifiedself.com/) movement. By definition these are people who are already deeply engaged with their personal data, and for health issues that's health data. Do we have a liaison with them? I know a number of the leaders and activist members.

I mention this because they'll be the early adopters for consumer-developed workflows.
it would be good to have a liason with them but we don't
Okay, I'm going to urge that y'all get together. :-) If /when I find some interested people, whom should they ping here?
altho not the same there's https://openhumans.slack.com/ and https://mydataglobal.slack.com which may have overlap - I haven't circled back around to this stuff much lately but I will...
